item.title: Jeff Lynne Cancels Final ELO Show Due to Health Issues
item.description: The frontman was on his “Over and Out" farewell tour.

item.description: The frontman was on his “Over and Out" farewell tour.

item.title: Scooter Braun Calls ‘Swag’ the “Most Authentically Justin Bieber Album to Date”
item.description: The longtime manager and the superstar parted ways in 2023.

item.title: Scooter Braun Calls ‘Swag’ the “Most Authentically Justin Bieber Album to Date”
item.description: The longtime manager and the superstar parted ways in 2023.

item.title: Drake Brings Out Lauryn Hill for Night One of London Wireless Festival
item.description: The artists performed a surprise mashup of “Ex Factor” and “Nice For What” during the R&B-themed show.

item.title: Drake Brings Out Lauryn Hill for Night One of London Wireless Festival
item.description: The artists performed a surprise mashup of “Ex Factor” and “Nice For What” during the R&B-themed show.

item.title: Justin Bieber’s ‘Swag’: A Track-by-Track Breakdown
item.description: R&Bieber is back for his first album in four years: a 21-track collection that’s both earnest and doesn’t take itself too seriously.

item.title: Justin Bieber’s ‘Swag’: A Track-by-Track Breakdown
item.description: R&Bieber is back for his first album in four years: a 21-track collection that’s both earnest and doesn’t take itself too seriously.

item.title: Travis Scott Reveals Sunday Release Date for ‘Jackboys 2’
item.description: “The Jack is back with 17 tracks full of trunk rattling classics in the making,” reads the album promo art Scott shared Thursday night.
